message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the product's uniqueness, but my budget allows me to pay up to $850000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and your budget.
